title: Apigee - Customize the display
abstract:
# Apigee - Customize the display
**    Preview    — Apigee API hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
**Required permissions:** You must have [administrator permissions](/apigee/docs/api-hub/permissions#roles) to view the **Settings** page and customize the API hub display.
The **Display** page provides settings that a user with [administrator permissions](/apigee/docs/api-hub/permissions#roles) can use  to:
- Specify **Organization name** 
- Disable API scorecard
content:
## Modify organization name
To view or modify the organization name:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **API hub** , **Settings** page. [Go to Settings](https://console.cloud.google.com/apigee/hub/settings) The **Display** tab is displayed by default.
- Specify the **Organization name** to display in the UI. This name is displayed   in multiple locations in the UI as shown in the following examples:
- Click **Save** (or **Reset** (resets form, does not save)).## Disable or enable API scorecard
The scorecard is displayed (enabled) by default.
To disable or enable the display of the scorecard:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **API hub** , **Settings** page. [Go to Settings](https://console.cloud.google.com/apigee/hub/settings) The **Display** tab is selected by default.
- Select the **Disable API scores** check box to disable it, or clear the **Disable API score** check box to enable it.
- Click **Save** (or **Reset** (resets form, does not save)).
